favourite.article: This song was first released in Irvine in 1987 where we spent 2 weeks living at the meeting hall. Who else remembers this? I believe a brother named Duane wrote this song.
The Kingdom's mine just by calling on His name each day! Oh Lord Jesus!!!
Lord give us a hungry heart ...to seek YOU. Lord operate in us!

In the midst of time, the kingdomâ€™s mine just by calling on His name each day.
OOOOOOO LORD JESUS!!!!!!!
Life really is too short. Oh saints! We need to redeem our time because the days are evil. Love the Lord now, serve the Lord now! COME LORD JESUS!
Lord I submit myself to You. I consecrate my whole being to You. Lord, I need You. I'm running the race in You, Lord. The New Jerusalem is my goal. Amen! Praise Jehovah!

Lord, I give You my little tiny life, that I'll be fully constituted with the truth. Saints, our life really too short! We now need to consecrate, offer up ourselves to Him as living sacrifice to Him, to serve Him to the end of our lives. We must be ready for His move and for the building up of His Body, that the golden lampstands on earth may shine brightly everywhere. I love You, Lord!

"Saints our life is so short. That is why "we need to live as if the Lord will come today but plan as if the Lord will not come in a hundred years." This is a serious matter. Let him who is righteous do righteous still. If we want to serve the Lord, let's serve Him. "No one who puts His hand on the plow and looks behind is fit for the kingdom of God...it's a warning to us all. AMEN.

Truly life is too short. as we are still young, and still standing strong, we need to stand for God's testimony. let's not waste are time for wordly pleasure which all are vanity. Consecrate ourselves to Him... Amen
life is too short to waste for worldly things or living in flesh...its time to sumbit oneself to the kingdom of the lord praising his words...Amen!
Amen! O Lord we don't want to waste a single day! We want every day to be a day of growth. Praise You Lord! We have all the time to grow but none to waste. Lord Jesus grow in us!!
Life is way too short to waste a single day. Lord, our goal is the New Jerusalem! Hallelujah!
Time is really short!thats why we need to treasure our time enjoying the Lords presence....amen!

I like this song because it always reminds me that life is really short to waste each day in things that are not worthy...hope our heart would come fully to the Lord and serve Him in the days not only in our youth but for the rest of our life....
This song reminds me of Summer School of Truth.
